content: WASHINGTON  March 29 Pest control company Terminix International Co LP and its U.S. Virgin Islands operation were charged on Tuesday with illegally applying a restricted-use pesticide in multiple residences in the Virgin Islands  the U.S. Justice Department said.
name: ServiceMaster Global Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Terminix to pay $10 mln for pesticide misuse -U.S. Justice Dept.
